Source: Calculated from Marrakesh (https://idrc-crdi.ca/en/research-in-action/mitigating-soil-contamination-abandoned-moroccan-mine-sites). The Kettara mine is an abandoned pyrrhotite ore mine that has been closed since 1982 and is located 30 km northwest of Marrakesh

operators: Société d’exploitation de Pyrrhotine de Kettara (SEPYK)

web_search_companies.notes: The mine was operated by SEPYK and was previously owned by BRPM, which is now ONHYM.
